title: Fiery serpents
content: Snakes marked with flamelike spots, or whose bite caused acute inflammation (

). The Lord sent these upon the children of Israel to “straiten them,” and He prepared a way that those who were bitten might be healed by looking at the serpent of brass that Moses raised up before them, which was a symbol of the Redeemer being lifted upon the cross (
). The event is confirmed in latter-day revelation (
